section.title: Logging in Java WS Core
section.para: The following information applies to Java WS Core and all services built on Java WS Core.

Java WS Core has two types of loggers. One logger is used for development logging and by default writes to standard out. The other logger includes system administration information and is CEDPs best practices compliant for easier readability.
Configuration for both loggers can be changed by editing $GLOBUS_LOCATION/container-log4j.properties.
For more information about development logging in Java WS Core, see the Debugging section of the Developer's Guide
